entry.title: Vite report on Tue, 15 Aug 2023 06:01:20
entry.summary:
Tech:
- FCC launches voluntary IoT security label program
- SteelSeries Arctis Nova Pro Wireless review: A high-end gaming headset
- AI companies must prove their AI is safe, says nonprofit group
- Atomic, GV, & SOSV join the Startup Battlefield judges lineup at TechCrunch Disrupt 2023
- A look at airflowctl, a tool to help developers manage Apache Airflow projects
- ChatGPT's traffic dips in July, potential summer lull in AI frenzy
- A Decade of Innovation: The Apple Watch Series 9 and the Anticipated Watch X Revamp
- iPhone 14 Pro Battery Life Concerns: A New Chapter in the Batterygate Saga?

Business:
- Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway's investments and stock changes
- University of Chicago to pay $13.5 million to students in financial aid scandal
- US stocks rise ahead of retail data, trying to shake off August slump
- Saudi group reportedly abandons $2 billion deal with Lord of the Rings game company
- Bond markets flashing warning signs, according to market vet Ed Yardeni

AI:
- AI companies must prove their AI is safe, says nonprofit group
- ChatGPT's traffic dips in July, potential summer lull in AI frenzy

Other:
- DOL's Davis-Bacon Act overhaul brings significant changes
- Russia's Yasen-class submarines to get hypersonic missiles
- Ukraine's students to take classes on navigating minefields
- California to Texas migration for cost of living and politics
- NASA map shows solar eclipse viewing locations in the US in 2023 and 2024
- Study shows dementia more common in older adults with vision issues
- The Biden administration urges Supreme Court to take up content moderation cases
- The Elon Musk versus Mark Zuckerberg beef escalates
- Now you can get food delivered to your gate at some US airports
- A protein may be a culprit in chronic fatigue syndrome
- Former McDonald's chef claims chicken sandwich imitated Chick-fil-A's
- TikToker shows how to get a week's worth of groceries from Dollar General for $35

Insights:
- IoT security is a growing concern, leading to the FCC's label program
- High-end gaming headsets like the SteelSeries Arctis Nova Pro Wireless set the standard
- Nonprofit groups are emphasizing the need for AI safety and accountability
- The business landscape is influenced by Warren Buffett's investments and market trends
- The migration from California to Texas reflects a desire for better cost of living and political climate
- The Biden administration is focused on content moderation and its legal implications
- The rivalry between Elon Musk and Mark Zuckerberg continues to escalate
- Convenience services like food delivery at airports are becoming more prevalent
- Research is uncovering potential causes and treatments for health conditions like dementia and chronic fatigue syndrome
- Social media platforms like TikTok continue to evolve and attract users with new features and content
- Market indicators suggest potential economic challenges and warning signs in the bond market.
